document.title: Tasks Options
document.paragraph:
Tasks dialog
It is possible to have a command executed before/after a compilation. Tasks have these properties:
Command: command to execute
Description: an optional description about the external
Working directory: an optional working directory, if nothing is specified, the path to the configuration file will be used
Must succeed: does the task have to finish successful for the compilation to continue?
Condition: allows the same configuration with tasks to work in different situations (e.g. windows and unix) (see 020_target_general.xmlconditionconditions)
